an1.61:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va kusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna va akusala dhamma parihayanti yathayidam, bhikkhave, viriyarambho.
an1.61:1.2: Araddhaviriyassa, bhikkhave, anuppanna ceva kusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna ca akusala dhamma parihayanti”ti.
an1.62:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va akusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna va kusala dhamma parihayanti yathayidam, bhikkhave, mahicchata.
an1.62:1.2: Mahicchassa, bhikkhave, anuppanna ceva akusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna ca kusala dhamma parihayanti”ti.
an1.63:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va kusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna va akusala dhamma parihayanti yathayidam, bhikkhave, appicchata.
an1.63:1.2: Appicchassa, bhikkhave, anuppanna ceva kusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna ca akusala dhamma parihayanti”ti.
an1.64:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va akusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna va kusala dhamma parihayanti yathayidam, bhikkhave, asantutthita.
an1.64:1.2: Asantutthassa, bhikkhave, anuppanna ceva akusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna ca kusala dhamma parihayanti”ti.
an1.65:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va kusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna va akusala dhamma parihayanti yathayidam, bhikkhave, santutthita.
an1.65:1.2: Santutthassa, bhikkhave, anuppanna ceva kusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna ca akusala dhamma parihayanti”ti.
an1.66:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va akusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna va kusala dhamma parihayanti yathayidam, bhikkhave, ayonisomanasikaro.
an1.66:1.2: Ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasi karoto anuppanna ceva akusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna ca kusala dhamma parihayanti”ti.
an1.67:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va kusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna va akusala dhamma parihayanti yathayidam, bhikkhave, yonisomanasikaro.
an1.67:1.2: Yoniso, bhikkhave, manasi karoto anuppanna ceva kusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna ca akusala dhamma parihayanti”ti.
an1.68:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va akusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna va kusala dhamma parihayanti yathayidam, bhikkhave, asampajannam.
an1.68:1.2: Asampajanassa, bhikkhave, anuppanna ceva akusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna ca kusala dhamma parihayanti”ti.
an1.69:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va kusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna va akusala dhamma parihayanti yathayidam, bhikkhave, sampajannam.
an1.69:1.2: Sampajanassa, bhikkhave, anuppanna ceva kusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna ca akusala dhamma parihayanti”ti.
an1.70:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va akusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna va kusala dhamma parihayanti yathayidam, bhikkhave, papamittata.
an1.70:1.2: Papamittassa, bhikkhave, anuppanna ceva akusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna ca kusala dhamma parihayanti”ti.
